roles.name: Basic
roles.description: Can read general options like languages and preference types. Can read and update own user and preferences.

roles.name: Reader
roles.description: Can read all users and preferences. Can read and update own user and preferences.

roles.name: Admin
roles.description: Can read and update all resources and configurations. Can also delete users and their preferences.

roles.name: Application Client
roles.description: Can register new roles or permissions.
